North Korea just basically said "It's regrettable that the talks are cancelled, but we're still willing to meet." How is that folding? Their stance didn't change one bit.

If there was a safe chemical solution to insomnia, stress, depression and anxiety, it would be the most popular product ever. Therefore either it doesn't work, it's unsafe or both. Seems like a bad idea.

Stephen Hawking changed the world while stuck in a wheelchair and unable to speak. Don't underestimate what you can achieve.

1530451214_12rREqqdMUPsAPuMR1p87Zj8TS4Yo.body: A genetics origin for homosexuality makes no sense. Homosexual couples will naturally have fewer children than heterosexuals, so this trait would have been selected against and it would have disappeared over time.
